title: Died while using stopwatch
body: So i used stopwatch while i was being pushed into the enemy fountain, but is still died. idk how, but yeah. video for what happend, you can clearly see statis is still active

replies.body: Well, Stopwatch doesn't work under fountain, so this isn't a bug.

> [{quoted}](name=PavLoo,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=iIbAK0AE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-29T20:13:46.672+0000)
>
> Well, Stopwatch doesn't work under fountain, so this isn't a bug.

It's a stasis effect, like Zhonya's, which grants untargetability, which means the laser doesn't target you. If the laser targeted and damaged someone in Stopwatch stasis, that would be a bug. Too bad OP's video is clipped too short to really tell what happened.

> [{quoted}](name=PavLoo,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=iIbAK0AE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-29T20:13:46.672+0000)
>
> Well, Stopwatch doesn't work under fountain, so this isn't a bug.

It does?

How often do you see players diving in fountain and using Zhonyas.
Summoning platform death ray goes through everything. Even white shields are bypassed entirely.
It also disables revives, like GA or Zilean ult.
